overview: More than 4 and a half hours of intense double penetrations, 13 hardcore scenes and 15 girls are what's in store for you with this special 2 DVD anthology. Double penetration is still the fantasy of many men, and few women admit they'd like to try it. Marc Dorcel gives you the unique opportunity to review the best double penetration scenes, hand-picked just for you from his extensive catalog within the last ten years.
title: Double Penetration Anthology
